scenes.speaker: Narrator
dialogue: It's twelve days north of Hopeless, and a few degrees south of Freezing to Death. It's located solidly on the Meridian of Misery.

scenes.speaker: Narrator
dialogue: My village. In a word, sturdy.
It's been here for seven generations, but every single building is new.
We have fishing, hunting, and a charming view of the sunset…

scenes.speaker: Narrator
dialogue: You see, some places have mice or mosquitoes.

scenes.speaker: Narrator
dialogue: But they're not here right now.
In fact, it's been a few weeks since the last dragon raid, so everyone's on tenterhooks waiting for the next one.
Meaning the best place for me to be right now is here - the smithy.

scenes.speaker: ambient
dialogue:
It's 2 months before that fateful night.
But even at this point, things can change.

scenes.speaker: Narrator
dialogue: The Mangler sits half-done in the shop's corner.
Hiccup spies his missing sketchbook lying on a nearby bench.
